alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; Perry (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 2:22PM CDT until May 10 at 2:01PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas... Arkansas River At Toad Suck Lock And Dam Tailwater affecting Faulkner and Perry Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO EARLY TUESDAY AFTERNOON... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD ADVISORY... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River At Toad Suck Lock And Dam Tailwater. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to early Tuesday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 268.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 275.6 feet Sunday evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday morning. - Flood stage is 275.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Arkansas River Toad Suck Lock 275.0 268. Fri 1 PM 273.3 275.5 274.5 275.6 7 PM 5/8 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
